title: Solar Orbiter Level 2 Magnetometer Data in RTN Coordinates in Burst Mode - T. Horbury (The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'EPOCH' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/mag/science/l2/rtn-burst/2020/solo_l2_mag-rtn-burst_20200415_v02.cdf. The most common cadence, 7815287 [ns] = PT0.007815S, occurred for 37.2122% of the 4115226 timesteps.
info.contact: T. Horbury @ The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Epoch encoded as Terrestrial Time on rotating Earth geoid, ns since J2000

parameters.name: B_RTN
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in RTN coordinates
